title: Full-Length Fluid Maxi Dress
image_prompt: Isolated flat-lay product render of a full-length maxi dress on a plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching, soft drape, subtle sheen, sleeveless with a halter neckline, A-line silhouette, concealed back zipper, minimal trims, commercial-ready design
style_fit: relaxed fit through body with gentle waist shaping
techpack: Full-length A-line maxi dress with halter neckline, sleeveless, lightweight silk blend shell with viscose lining, concealed back zipper closure, self-fabric waist tie, clean finished hem; total length approx. 58 inches from shoulder to hem.
provenance: Inspired by the 'Full-length' trend in lengths category; designed for commercial production with timeless silhouette and versatile color palette.
